artist: Artist: Isabella Bannerman , et al.; Author: Trina Robbins , et al.; Editor: Sabrina Jones , et al.; Publisher: World War 3 llustrated, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and illustration of a tenement scene centered on a tip-toeing woman, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 96 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: World War 3 Illustrated #16 Herstories
